quote: there are people all over the world who carry the mermaid inside them, that otherworldly beauty and longing and desire that made her reach for heaven when she lived in the darkness of the sea.
quote_letters: THERE ARE PEOPLE ALL OVER THE WORLD WHO CARRY THE MERMAID INSIDE THEM THAT OTHERWORLDLY BEAUTY AND LONGING AND DESIRE THAT MADE HER REACH FOR HEAVEN WHEN SHE LIVED IN THE DARKNESS OF THE SEA
